name: Asteroids (itch) (Florimond Manca)
description:
Asteroids is a lovely classic retro game. This is an early prototype of a remake of Asteroids with Lua and the Love2D framework.

Hop on your space vehicle and destroy all asteroids to win the game!

Currently included game features are:

  • Asteroids split when stricken by a bullet
  • When they split, asteroids sometimes leave a pickup that enables triple shoot mode!
  • Wandering enemies aim and shoot at you or leave freeze mines— beware!
  • Health bar — yet unlimited lives for now
  • Score and time counters
  • Original soundtrack specially crafted for the occasion

Prototype and music by Florimond Manca
